animals.name: Zorblaxian Lurker
animals.description: Masters of camouflage from Zorblax V.
animals.fun_fact: Can change texture to match any surface.

animals.name: Quarnox Glider
animals.description: A sky-dwelling predator that soars through gas clouds.
animals.fun_fact: Its wings generate static energy during flight.

animals.name: Marnok Behemoth
animals.description: A lumbering titan known for its echoing roar.

animals.name: Gelid Screamer
animals.description: An icy creature whose shriek freezes prey mid-move.
animals.fun_fact: Can lower the temperature around it by 40°C.

animals.name: Zenthrax Stinger
animals.description: Six-legged speedster with a paralyzing tail spike.
animals.fun_fact: Can sprint faster than sound in short bursts.

animals.name: Orbital Nymph
animals.fun_fact: Feeds on ambient radiation and stardust.

animals.name: Tharnok Crawler
animals.description: A many-legged brute with crushing mandibles.

animals.name: Pyroskitter
animals.description: Tiny insectoid that glows like molten metal.
animals.fun_fact: Emits bursts of plasma to escape predators.

animals.name: Celestoon
animals.fun_fact: Glows in tune with surrounding emotions.

animals.name: Razorplume
animals.fun_fact: Can shed feathers as projectile weapons.
